name: dictionaryapi
google Translate (to En)
code: let tmp = await fetch(   "https://translate.googleapis.com/translate_a/single?client=gtx&dt=t&dt=bd&dj=1&sl=auto" +     "&tl=en&q=" +     encodeURIComponent(inout), ); tmp = await tmp.json(); tmp = tmp.sentences.map((s) => s.trans).join(""); inout = tmp;
